<p>
  <span><span class="authortext"><a href="/users/strobo/"><img alt=
  "" class="icon" src=
  "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
  <a href="/users/strobo/">strobo</a></span></span> has developed a
  cool chrome extension for the mbed compiler!
</p>
<p>
  <img src=
  "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/_scaled_mbedfont.png"
  alt="/media/uploads/anaran/_scaled_mbedfont.png" title=
  "/media/uploads/anaran/_scaled_mbedfont.png">
</p>
<p>
  The extension allows you to change font and font size and also
  highlights matching brackets.
</p>
<p>
  Check out his notebook page <a href=
  "http://mbed.org/users/strobo/notebook/change-editor-font-in-chrome/">
  here</a> for download links.
</p>
